tool_description: An API showing all the latest mobile phones around the world so users can compare with their pricing and specification.
name: Mobile Phone Live
title: Mobile Phone Live

api_list.name: Get All Mobile Detail with specific market research
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all the details of mobile marketplaces and newly launched mobile devices.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mobile-phone-live.p.rapidapi.com/mobile/ndtv"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mobile-phone-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mobile-phone-live.p.rapidapi.com/mobile/{mobileid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mobile-phone-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
